all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And after many days an angel of the Lord appeared unto Adam, saying: Why dost thou offer sacrifices unto the Lord? And Adam said unto him: I know not, save the Lord commanded me.
Moses 5:6
Quote of the Day
"It’s inspiring to see generational families of all backgrounds … dedicating their time and talents to serve others."
Elder Carlos A. Godoy | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
